data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Ouangani to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ouangani, Mayotte
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Ouangani, Mayotte.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next week to families who are far from God in Ouangani, Mayotte.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Please, teach the 4 believers in Ouangani, Mayotte how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Ouangani, Mayotte humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Ouangani, Mayotte to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Ouangani.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Ouangani, Mayotte to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ouangani, Mayotte has a population of 3,800.

We estimate Ouangani has 4 people who might know Jesus, 58 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,738 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 949 neighbors who need Jesus.
